class.name: Phaser.Physics.Ninja.Circle

parameters.name: body
parameters.help: The body that owns this shape.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The x coordinate to create this shape at.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The y coordinate to create this shape at.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.help: The radius of this Circle.

class.help: Ninja Physics Circle constructor.\nNote: This class could be massively optimised and reduced in size. I leave that challenge up to you.

public.name: collideCircleVsTile

returns.help: True if they collide, otherwise false.

public.help: Collides this Circle with a Tile.

parameters.name: t
parameters.help: The Tile involved in the collision.

public.name: collideWorldBounds
public.help: Collides this Circle against the world bounds.

public.name: destroy
public.help: Destroys this Circle's reference to Body and System

public.name: render
public.help: Render this circle for debugging purposes.

parameters.name: context
parameters.help: The context to render to.

parameters.name: xOffset
parameters.help: X offset from circle's position to render at.

parameters.name: yOffset
parameters.help: Y offset from circle's position to render at.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug shape to be rendered. (format is css color string).

parameters.name: filled
parameters.help: Render the shape as solid (true) or hollow (false).

public.help: Process a world collision and apply the resulting forces.
